long_description: The Black Diamond Positron quickdraw set offers lots of performance features at an excellent value. Straight and bent gate Positron carabiners are linked by a 14mm-wide Dynex dogbone runner to create a strong and lightweight quickdraw. Positron carabiners have keylock noses that won't snag on webbing or bolt hangers. Rubber Straitjacket(TM) insert in runner loop keeps bent gate carabiner in proper orientation for easier and more efficient clipping. Black Diamond Positron quickdraw sets are available in 12cm or 18cm lengths.
short_description: The Black Diamond Positron quickdraw set offers lots of performance features at an excellent value.
